channel.title: General Blogs College Movies Humor Awesome on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: cecil. word
item.description: so i was hanging out at work. and i decided to check up on some blogs as a pat on the back for doing good work - and i checked this blog i read of this women who went to cornell and was an aquaintence of mine and friends or my friends.. anyway.. on her blog there was a mention of a friend of mine from college who i had lost touch with - cecil - who is apparently working in film.
